trans-unit.source: Warning!
trans-unit.target: Warning!

trans-unit.source: After installation, the MySQL root password is empty by default.
trans-unit.target: After installation, the MySQL root password is empty by default.

trans-unit.source: It's recommended that you run mysql\_secure\_installation, a script that helps secure MySQL.
trans-unit.target: It's recommended that you run mysql\_secure\_installation, a script that helps secure MySQL.

trans-unit.source: When running mysql\_secure\_installation, you will be prompted to change the MySQL root password, remove anonymous user accounts, disable remote root logins, remove test databases, and reload the privileges table.
trans-unit.target: When running mysql\_secure\_installation, you will be prompted to change the MySQL root password, remove anonymous user accounts, disable remote root logins, remove test databases, and reload the privileges table.

trans-unit.source: It is recommended that you answer yes to all of these options and change the root password.
trans-unit.target: It is recommended that you answer yes to all of these options and change the root password.

trans-unit.source: Run the following command to execute the script:
trans-unit.target: Run the following command to execute the script:

trans-unit.source: After you run, you can login to MySQL:
trans-unit.target: After you run, you can login to MySQL:

trans-unit.source: Enter the MySQL root password (which you changed in the previous step) and you'll be presented with a prompt where you can issue SQL statements to interact with the database.
trans-unit.target: Enter the MySQL root password (which you changed in the previous step) and you'll be presented with a prompt where you can issue SQL statements to interact with the database.

trans-unit.source: To create a new MySQL user, run the following at the mysql> prompt:
trans-unit.target: To create a new MySQL user, run the following at the mysql> prompt:

trans-unit.target: Note, the semi-colons (;) at the end of the lines are crucial for ending the commands.

trans-unit.source: To create a database and grant the mysqluser user permissions on it, issue the following commands:
trans-unit.target: To create a database and grant the mysqluser user permissions on it, issue the following commands:

trans-unit.source: Note that database user names and passwords are only used by scripts connecting to the database.
trans-unit.target: Note that database user names and passwords are only used by scripts connecting to the database.

trans-unit.source: Database user account names do not necessarily represent actual user accounts on the system.
trans-unit.target: Database user account names do not necessarily represent actual user accounts on the system.

trans-unit.target: To exit the MySQL database administration utility, issue the following command:

trans-unit.source: After MySQL is installed, you'll need to configure an endpoint so that MySQL can be accessed remotely.
trans-unit.target: After MySQL is installed, you'll need to configure an endpoint so that MySQL can be accessed remotely.

trans-unit.source: Log in to the <link><linkText>Azure Management Portal[azurepreviewportal]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Log in to the <link><linkText>Azure Management Portal[azurepreviewportal]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: In the Azure portal, click Virtual Machines, click the name of your new VM, and then click Endpoints.
trans-unit.target: In the Azure portal, click Virtual Machines, click the name of your new VM, and then click Endpoints.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Endpoints</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Endpoints</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click Add at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: Click Add at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Endpoints</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Endpoints</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Add an endpoint named "MySQL" with protocol TCP, and Public and Private ports set to "3306".
trans-unit.target: Add an endpoint named "MySQL" with protocol TCP, and Public and Private ports set to "3306".

trans-unit.source: This allows remote access to MySQL.
trans-unit.target: This allows remote access to MySQL.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Endpoints</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Endpoints</linkText>

trans-unit.source: You've successfully configured MySQL, created a database, and a new user.
trans-unit.target: You've successfully configured MySQL, created a database, and a new user.
